entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
We apologize that some of our flights have been affected due to COVID-19. Nevertheless, our priority is that you arrive at your destination safely. 

We ask that you please read our flexibility policy: https://t.co/M1Elyn5dTk

data.text: Due to COVID-19 protocols, some flights have been modified. To check the status of your flight, click here: https://t.co/NP5yVbTthy https://t.co/ets57fIaXP

The current worldwide situation continues to pose problems which have led to the cancelation or delay of some of our flights. We are working to take you to your destination as soon as possible. 

Flexibility options if your flight has been affected: https://t.co/HX9YhZRl5v

data.text:
It is of the utmost importance to us that you arrive at your destination on time. We apologize if your flight has been affected due to the new variant, Omicron. 

For this reason, we share our flexibility options so you can get home safely: https://t.co/2S6GncLmIB

Your safety is our top priority. Due to the recent surge in cases worldwide, we have implemented protocols that have affected some of our flights. We are doing everything we can to take you to your destination as quickly and as safely as possible. https://t.co/Zl7IYcXRnK https://t.co/Vx5ag56ReY

Explore one of Mexico’s cultural capitals. If you’ve never been to Guadalajara or if you’ve been 100 times, our best deals can get you there.

data.text:
Start the new year off right with a trip to Mexico City. Check out our deals to this fantastic city, with great food and weather to match.  
https://t.co/bU3TTqFa8r https://t.co/7Ti48IIXNn
This holiday season, we're proud to be reuniting you with your loved ones, while always putting your safety first. https://t.co/Y8UKVudmun
Starting January 18 we will be launching a new route connecting the new @PalmerolaHN (XPL) with Mexico City on one of three weekly flights. https://t.co/WWkfx6Ftud

Did you know in Mexico Christmas celebrations mainly take place on Christmas Eve? It's the time when families get together to enjoy a special dinner and celebrate this much anticipated holiday. Feliz Navidad! https://t.co/ql2ieuVYAe
Christmas is all around in Mexico! Have you been to San Miguel? https://t.co/eA2SfMy5LU
Tis' the season for... a traditional Mexican hot chocolate! Pair it with a "concha" sweet bread for an explosion of traditional flavors. https://t.co/LKgOM9wXKB
Fly at the height of technology when you fly on board our Dreamliner. https://t.co/v5p1PwhK0f

https://t.co/0u38fxZ4It https://t.co/sYYfKdI46k

data.text: We once again participated in the 2021 edition of FAMEX (Mexico Aerospace Fair) accompanied by the US ambassador, Ken Salazar (@USAmbMex), as well as a crew from @ASSA and @ASPA. We participate to boost the growth, innovation, and promotion of aviation in Mexico. https://t.co/tZ2rig4z9R
